properties.areaDesc: Ogemaw; Alcona; Wexford; Missaukee; Crawford; Roscommon; Oscoda; Manistee
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 3:06PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rain this evening is expected to transition to freezing
rain overnight into early Saturday morning with ice accumulation
of up to two tenths of an inch. Mixed precipitation continues
Saturday morning before transitioning to all snow Saturday
afternoon through Saturday night. Total snow accumulations of 6
to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Portions of Northern Lower Michigan.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility. Isolated power outages
are possible due to the combination of ice and gusty winds.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
